title: Colin Cowherd's Blazing 5: 12/01/2018
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd's Blazing 5: 12/01/2018
description:
Coming off his worst Blazing 5 of the year Colin tries to rebound and gives his Blazing 5 picks from week 13 to RJ Bell of Pregame.com and Fox Sports Radio who tells him which ones the wise guys in Vegas agree with. Plus, Colin releases a special bonus pick that was not included in his Blazing 5.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
